display_long_description:
GUN JAM is a rhythm FPS where the player must shoot to the beat to survive. It features a unique beat-pattern shooting mechanic and firefights synced to the original soundtrack in a vibrant world. Prepare to obliterate enemies whilst blasting to the beat.

DEFEAT TO THE BEAT

Carefully match your shots to the beat pattern, fight off hordes of enemies to survive the musical dystopia and restore freedom to the masses.

SYNC WITH THE SOUND OF THE CITY

FPS firefights are synced to our original, multi-genre soundtrack featuring EDM, TrapHop and Metal music. Immerse yourself in our art style and vibrant surroundings that react to the music.

BLAST BADDIES WITH VARIOUS WEAPONS

Use the Pistol, Shotgun, Z Gun, Amp Cannon and Synth Rifle to hit the hordes of troopers headed your way. Become a master of GUN JAM’s unique beat-pattern shooting mechanic in either our Arcade or Freeplay gaming modes.

REBEL AGAINST THE SPEAKER

Welcome to the vibrant city of ‘Mubel’ where the omni-present ‘Beat’ means everything and music is used as a means of control. While city-dwellers dance to The Speaker’s ruling tune, you must rebel and break out of its hypnotic flow by force.
